div.data-content-title: NH psychotherapist discusses effects of coronavirus crisis on anxiety levels

div.div: Everyone is trying to find their footing in this new normal of working from home, teaching kids while they learn remotely and also being isolated from family and friends. >> Download the FREE WMUR appWMUR’s Cherise Leclerc spoke to Concord-based psychotherapist Lynn Lyons about steps to take to keep ourselves mentally healthy through these unprecedented times.>> COVID-19 in New Hampshire: What you need to knowSee the entire interview in the video player above in two parts that are separated by a brief break. Or, visit each link below to see the parts: Visit this link to view Part 1Visit this link to view Part 2

div.p: Everyone is trying to find their footing in this new normal of working from home, teaching kids while they learn remotely and also being isolated from family and friends.
WMUR’s Cherise Leclerc spoke to Concord-based psychotherapist Lynn Lyons about steps to take to keep ourselves mentally healthy through these unprecedented times.

p.strong: >> COVID-19 in New Hampshire: What you need to know

div.p: See the entire interview in the video player above in two parts that are separated by a brief break. Or, visit each link below to see the parts:

li.a: Visit this link to view Part 1
Visit this link to view Part 2
